quest.name: When Mother Calls
journal: Gullinkambi needs someone to deliver a message.
Gullinkambi would task her child, Kal Myhk, with today's hunt, but he has yet to return home. She asks that you find him, and relay her words to him.

You find Kal Myhk not far from Anyx Trine. In trying to ascertain what manner of being you are, he comes to the erroneous conclusion that you are an enemy from Ishgard, and flees in a panic. Search for Kal Myhk, and deliver his mother's message.
You find Kal Myhk again close by. Convinced you are an enemy sent to slay him, he runs off yet again before you can talk to him. Search for Kal Myhk, and deliver his mother's message.

You find Kal Myhk, but this time he refuses to run away. He stands his ground, prepared for the worst, but is caught by surprise to hear you bring word from his mother. Before you can relay this message, however, he insists on testing you. He asks you to catch him as he flies off to parts unknown. Track down Kal Myhk, and deliver his mother's message.

You find Kal Myhk hiding naively in the ruins close to his last hiding spot. Having taken interest in you, he asks for your name. Convinced you will not find him again, he challenges you to find him one last time. Track down Kal Myhk, and deliver his mother's message.

You find Kal Myhk, this time out in the open near the entrance to Anyx Trine. He is impressed that you were able to keep up with him, and decides you will make a good partner. For what, exactly, only he knows. But with games of hide-and-seek finally over, you can at last tell him of his mother's request.
objectives: Humor Kal Myhk by tracking him down.
Find Kal Myhk one last time.

dialogue.name: GULLINKAMBI
dialogue.text: The stench of man, yet somehow different... Ah, a companion to Ysayle. Very well. I would ask you a favor.

dialogue.name: GULLINKAMBI
dialogue.text: My child now explores the wilderness. I would task him with the hunt for today's meal, but he has yet to return.

dialogue.name: GULLINKAMBI
dialogue.text: Seek the dragon Kal Myhk. Tell him he must hunt.

dialogue.name: GULLINKAMBI
dialogue.text: Kal Myhk is but a child, and will not travel far. Tell him he must hunt.

dialogue.name: KALMYHK
dialogue.text: Hm...? You are no creature of this land. Who are you? What are you?

dialogue.name: KALMYHK
dialogue.text: No wings, no fangs, no scales like a beast... So a man, then. A man from Ishgard! Stay away!

dialogue.name: KALMYHK
dialogue.text: Come no closer, man of Ishgard. I will not be your trophy, nor your meal!

dialogue.name: KALMYHK
dialogue.text: Fine! Do what you will. But you will not have the satisfaction of battle.

dialogue.name: KALMYHK
dialogue.text: ...A message from Mother? So you are not an enemy, then.

dialogue.name: KALMYHK
dialogue.text: If you would speak with me, then first a test! Catch me if you can.

dialogue.name: KALMYHK
dialogue.text: Quite perceptive. What is your name?

dialogue.name: KALMYHK
dialogue.text: Forename... Heh heh heh, a strange name. You will not find me this time, Forename.

dialogue.name: KALMYHK
dialogue.text: Interesting. So you're not as slow as I thought.

dialogue.name: KALMYHK
dialogue.text: Very well. You will make a fine partner. You may call me Kal Myhk.

dialogue.name: KALMYHK
dialogue.text: So you are a child of man? I've never met your kind before. Truly a peculiar breed you are.

dialogue.name: KALMYHK
dialogue.text: Now speak. What is the message you bring from Mother?

dialogue.name: KALMYHK
dialogue.text: Tell me what she would have me do, and it will be done.
